title: M-tron projects 10% organic revenue growth in 2025 with defense sector focus
excerpt: Discover M-tron Industries' impressive Q4 2024 results with an 18.9% revenue rise, strong defense demand, and plans for 10% growth in 2025.

html:
Earnings Call Insights: M-tron Industries, Inc. (MPTI) Q4 2024

Management View

  • Interim CEO Cameron Pforr highlighted M-tron's strong quarterly and annual performance, driven by continued demand in defense markets and strategic investments in production and R&D. Total revenues for Q4 2024 were $12.8
